/* 자격검증통계 카운트(시간별) */
SELECT dt_use , dt , '1' nrml , COALESCE("0", 0) "0", COALESCE("1", 0) "1", COALESCE("2", 0) "2" , COALESCE("3", 0) "3", COALESCE("4", 0) "4", COALESCE("5", 0) "5" , COALESCE("6", 0) "6", COALESCE("7", 0) "7", COALESCE("8", 0) "8" , COALESCE("9", 0) "9", COALESCE("10", 0) "10", COALESCE("11", 0) "11" , COALESCE("12", 0) "12", COALESCE("13", 0) "13", COALESCE("14", 0) "14" , COALESCE("15", 0) "15", COALESCE("16", 0) "16", COALESCE("17", 0) "17" , COALESCE("18", 0) "18", COALESCE("19", 0) "19", COALESCE("20", 0) "20" , COALESCE("21", 0) "21", COALESCE("22", 0) "22", COALESCE("23", 0) "23" FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(GENERATE_SERIES(DATE_TRUNC('month', CONCAT(#{bsM}, '-01')::DATE), DATE_TRUNC('month', CONCAT(#{bsM}, '-01')::DATE) + INTERVAL '1 month' - INTERVAL '1 day', '1 day'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') dt_use) AS tt LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM crosstab( 'SELECT hs.dt , hs.hr , SUM(hs.rslt_cd_00) tot FROM dqvs.dvs_st_verf_hour hs LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency agency ON hs.bzmn_sn = agency.bzmn_sn WHERE hs.dt::DATE BETWEEN CONCAT('''||#{bsM}||''', ''-01'')::DATE AND CONCAT('''||#{bsM}||''', ''-01'')::DATE + INTERVAL ''1 month'' - INTERVAL ''1 second''
AND agency.reg_cmptnc_cd = '''||#{cmptncCd}||'''
AND vrfc_mthd = '''||#{mthd}||'''
GROUP BY hs.dt , hs.hr ORDER BY dt ,hr' , 'SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(0,23)' ) AS RESULT(dt TEXT , "0" INT, "1" INT, "2" INT, "3" INT, "4" INT, "5" INT , "6" INT, "7" INT, "8" INT, "9" INT, "10" INT, "11" INT , "12" INT, "13" INT, "14" INT, "15" INT, "16" INT, "17" INT , "18" INT, "19" INT, "20" INT, "21" INT, "22" INT, "23" INT ) ) AS t1 ON tt.dt_use = t1.dt UNION SELECT dt_use , dt , '2' nrml , COALESCE("0", 0) "0", COALESCE("1", 0) "1", COALESCE("2", 0) "2" , COALESCE("3", 0) "3", COALESCE("4", 0) "4", COALESCE("5", 0) "5" , COALESCE("6", 0) "6", COALESCE("7", 0) "7", COALESCE("8", 0) "8" , COALESCE("9", 0) "9", COALESCE("10", 0) "10", COALESCE("11", 0) "11" , COALESCE("12", 0) "12", COALESCE("13", 0) "13", COALESCE("14", 0) "14" , COALESCE("15", 0) "15", COALESCE("16", 0) "16", COALESCE("17", 0) "17" , COALESCE("18", 0) "18", COALESCE("19", 0) "19", COALESCE("20", 0) "20" , COALESCE("21", 0) "21", COALESCE("22", 0) "22", COALESCE("23", 0) "23" FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(GENERATE_SERIES(DATE_TRUNC('month', CONCAT(#{bsM}, '-01')::DATE), DATE_TRUNC('month', CONCAT(#{bsM}, '-01')::DATE) + INTERVAL '1 month' - INTERVAL '1 day', '1 day'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') dt_use) AS tt LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM crosstab( 'SELECT hs.dt , hs.hr , SUM(hs.sum-hs.rslt_cd_00) tot FROM dqvs.dvs_st_verf_hour hs LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency agency ON hs.bzmn_sn = agency.bzmn_sn WHERE hs.dt::DATE BETWEEN CONCAT('''||#{bsM}||''', ''-01'')::DATE AND CONCAT('''||#{bsM}||''', ''-01'')::DATE + INTERVAL ''1 month'' - INTERVAL ''1 second''
AND agency.reg_cmptnc_cd = '''||#{cmptncCd}||'''
AND vrfc_mthd = '''||#{mthd}||'''
GROUP BY hs.dt , hs.hr ORDER BY dt ,hr' , 'SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(0,23)' ) AS RESULT(dt TEXT , "0" INT, "1" INT, "2" INT, "3" INT, "4" INT, "5" INT , "6" INT, "7" INT, "8" INT, "9" INT, "10" INT, "11" INT , "12" INT, "13" INT, "14" INT, "15" INT, "16" INT, "17" INT , "18" INT, "19" INT, "20" INT, "21" INT, "22" INT, "23" INT ) ) AS t1 ON tt.dt_use = t1.dt UNION SELECT dt_use , dt , '3' nrml , COALESCE("0", 0) "0", COALESCE("1", 0) "1", COALESCE("2", 0) "2" , COALESCE("3", 0) "3", COALESCE("4", 0) "4", COALESCE("5", 0) "5" , COALESCE("6", 0) "6", COALESCE("7", 0) "7", COALESCE("8", 0) "8" , COALESCE("9", 0) "9", COALESCE("10", 0) "10", COALESCE("11", 0) "11" , COALESCE("12", 0) "12", COALESCE("13", 0) "13", COALESCE("14", 0) "14" , COALESCE("15", 0) "15", COALESCE("16", 0) "16", COALESCE("17", 0) "17" , COALESCE("18", 0) "18", COALESCE("19", 0) "19", COALESCE("20", 0) "20" , COALESCE("21", 0) "21", COALESCE("22", 0) "22", COALESCE("23", 0) "23" FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(GENERATE_SERIES(DATE_TRUNC('month', CONCAT(#{bsM}, '-01')::DATE), DATE_TRUNC('month', CONCAT(#{bsM}, '-01')::DATE) + INTERVAL '1 month' - INTERVAL '1 day', '1 day'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') dt_use) AS tt LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM crosstab( 'SELECT hs.dt , hs.hr , SUM(hs.sum) tot FROM dqvs.dvs_st_verf_hour hs LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency agency ON hs.bzmn_sn = agency.bzmn_sn WHERE hs.dt::DATE BETWEEN CONCAT('''||#{bsM}||''', ''-01'')::DATE AND CONCAT('''||#{bsM}||''', ''-01'')::DATE + INTERVAL ''1 month'' - INTERVAL ''1 second''
AND agency.reg_cmptnc_cd = '''||#{cmptncCd}||'''
AND vrfc_mthd = '''||#{mthd}||'''
GROUP BY hs.dt , hs.hr ORDER BY dt ,hr' , 'SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(0,23)' ) AS RESULT(dt TEXT , "0" INT, "1" INT, "2" INT, "3" INT, "4" INT, "5" INT , "6" INT, "7" INT, "8" INT, "9" INT, "10" INT, "11" INT , "12" INT, "13" INT, "14" INT, "15" INT, "16" INT, "17" INT , "18" INT, "19" INT, "20" INT, "21" INT, "22" INT, "23" INT ) ) AS t1 ON tt.dt_use = t1.dt ORDER BY dt_use, nrml
